# Module: tf.strings



Defined in [`tensorflow/strings/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.9/tensorflow/strings/__init__.py).

Operations for working with string Tensors.

See the <a href="../../../api_guides/python/string_ops">Strings</a> guide.

## Functions

[`regex_full_match(...)`](../tf/strings/regex_full_match): Check if the input matches the regex pattern.
